original_title: Eleventh Biden aide Ian Sams appears in House Oversight Committee investigation | Fox News
article_summary: Former Biden spokesman Ian Sams is testifying before the House Oversight Committee as part of an investigation into allegations of a cover-up within the previous White House, specifically focusing on potential signs of mental decline in President Biden and his decision-making process. Sams, who served as a senior advisor and spokesman for the White House Counsel's Office, is expected to answer questions about his role in spinning negative stories about the president and his mishaps during Biden's term.</s>
